title: Some apps close after the screen goes to sleep
answer:
For EMUI 2.0 and EMUI 2.3, go to Settings, select Power saving > Protected apps and then manually add apps to the list. 

 For EMUI 3.0, go to Settings, select Power saving > Details > Keep running after screen off and then select the apps you require.
keywords: run in background, screen timeout, turn off screen, exit, lock screen, close
